title: Viewpoint on Perth
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray, Curtis Levy and Brian Woods
brief_description: The city of Perth, Western Australia, as seen through the eyes of European migrants. Commentary is made on the life style in Perth including housing, public transport, shopping facilities, job availability, industries, education and the role of the mining industry in Western Australia.
